publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3314 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Ordnance Survey - Education Initiative-That the Parliament notes Ordnance Survey's new education initiative which will provide around 50,000 primary 7 pupils in 1,500 Scottish schools with a map of their local area, along with explanatory leaflets, homework help and direct educational support; recognises that these maps can assist students in a number of subjects, including geography, environmental studies, local history and citizenship, helping children to understand and interpret the environment in which they live, and congratulates Ordnance Survey for the success of the initiative and their commitment to education.
S1M-3314 Ordnance Survey - Education Initiative (lodged on 19 August 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-3314 Ordnance Survey - Education Initiative (lodged on 19 August 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3314 Ordnance Survey - Education Initiative (lodged on 19 August 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-3314 Ordnance Survey - Education Initiative (lodged on 19 August 2002) Elaine Smith*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3314 Ordnance Survey - Education Initiative (lodged on 19 August 2002) Helen Eadie*
S1M-3314 Ordnance Survey - Education Initiative (lodged on 19 August 2002) Karen Gillon*
S1M-3314 Ordnance Survey - Education Initiative (lodged on 19 August 2002) Scott Barrie*
S1M-3314 Ordnance Survey - Education Initiative (lodged on 19 August 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
